desc:
The first screenshot is for the error that verifiers get when they click verify to finish verifying the case, the error comes up even when there is nothing wrong with the case being verified. Verifiers are not working as they are not able to continue as a result of the error message, the error is for both judgments and debt review verification.

The second screenshot is for debt review capturing, the capturer get the error after clicking finish to save the case. the capturer then has to change the case type to judgments and then back to debt review and only then is the case able to save.
name: CW - GCCW122 - Error messages
